source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003330_RAUBAHN<tab>There have been several skirmishes along the border, but as yet, neither side has delivered a decisive blow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003330_RAUBAHN<tab>Seit der Schlacht kommt es immer wieder zu Scharmützeln, aber momentan kann keine Seite die Oberhand gewinnen. Wir befinden uns in einer Pattsituation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003340_RAUBAHN<tab>We had long assumed that the Garleans would overwhelm us in a straight fight, but we seem to be gaining ground, albeit slowly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003340_RAUBAHN<tab>Diesen Umstand kann man als Erfolg feiern. Schließlich haben wir die garleischen Legionen lange für unaufhaltsam gehalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003350_RAUBAHN<tab>As to why that might be... The most likely explanation is that they have yet to commit all their forces. Still, we're winning, and our latest intelligence suggests the Emperor has retreated back to Garlemald.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003350_RAUBAHN<tab>Es könnte sein, dass sie ihre volle Kraft aus irgendeinem Grund zurückhalten. Interessant ist in dem Zusammenhang auch, dass sich Kaiser Varis laut unseren Kundschaftern von der Front zurückgezogen hat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003360_RAUBAHN<tab>In light of this, we're considering launching an offensive, with the aim of pushing the front line forward, and giving ourselves some room to breathe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003360_RAUBAHN<tab>Eigentlich eine günstige Gelegenheit, eine Offensive zu starten. Wir könnten die Garlear etwas zurückdrängen, um uns in eine bessere Position zu bringen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003370_PANICKEDFIGHTER<tab>Commander! The imperials─they've broken through our defenses to the east.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003370_PANICKEDFIGHTER<tab>Ober<var 16 /var>kommandant! Garleische Stoßtruppen haben unsere Verteidigungslinie im Osten durchbrochen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003380_RAUBAHN<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003380_RAUBAHN<tab>Was?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003390_PANICKEDFIGHTER<tab>Our scouts say their forces are being led by Lord Zenos!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003390_PANICKEDFIGHTER<tab>Man sagt, dass Prinz Zenos den Angriff anführt!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003400_PANICKEDFIGHTER<tab>Lord Hien and Commander Hext have taken their troops to provide support, but we don't know how long they can hold out.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003400_PANICKEDFIGHTER<tab>Die Einheiten von König Hien und Befehlshaberin Hext sind herangeeilt, um den Durchstoß aufzuhalten. Aber sie werden nicht lange halten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003410_RAUBAHN<tab>So they've been biding their time, waiting for his arrival, have they?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003410_RAUBAHN<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Deswegen<var 1A 01 /var> haben sie nicht angegriffen. Sie haben auf Zenos gewartet!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003420_RAUBAHN<tab>Very well. Send word to our allies, requesting reinforcements for the front line.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003420_RAUBAHN<tab>Gut. Setze alle Einheiten in Kenntnis. Die Linie <var 1A 02 /var>muss<var 1A 01 /var> gehalten werden!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003430_RAUBAHN<tab>Should the worst come to the worst, I may need to enter the fray myself. But what of you? Do you still have the strength to fight?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003430_RAUBAHN<tab>Wenn nötig, werde ich kämpfen, aber ich werde hier noch gebraucht. Was ist mit dir? Kämpfst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was antwortest du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You need only say the word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich halte die Garlear auf!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>So long as you leave the Ascian to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ich werde den Ascian besiegen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003440_RAUBAHN<tab>Much obliged. Given the choice, I'd take you over a hundred soldiers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003440_RAUBAHN<tab>Dann gibt es Hoffnung. An <var 1A 02 /var>dir<var 1A 01 /var> kommt niemand so schnell vorbei.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003450_RAUBAHN<tab>He may not <var 1A 02 /var>die<var 1A 01 /var> as such, but to see Lord Zenos fall on the battlefield would deal a heavy blow to imperial morale. I'll see to it the men stay clear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003450_RAUBAHN<tab>Ein unsterblicher Ascian ist nicht so leicht zu vernichten. Aber wenn man Zenos auf dem Schlachtfeld fallen sehen würde, käme der Ansturm sicher zum Erliegen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003460_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Why won't they open?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003460_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Warum? Warum öffnet es sich nicht?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Please... I bid you, open...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich flehe dich an<var 1D /var>... Öffne dich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003480_RAUBAHN<tab>What's wrong? Is it the voice again?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003480_RAUBAHN<tab>Was war los? Hast du wieder die Stimme gehört?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003490_RAUBAHN<tab>Are you sure you're in a fit state to do this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003490_RAUBAHN<tab>Kannst du kämpfen?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003500_RAUBAHN<tab>May Rhalgr grant us strength...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003500_RAUBAHN<tab>Gut. Einen Rückzug können wir uns nicht leisten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003510_RAUBAHN<tab>Give them hell, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. I, for my part, will defend this place to my dying breath.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003510_RAUBAHN<tab>Also dann! Schick sie in die Sieben Höllen! Ich werde diese Stellung bis zum letzten Atemzug verteidigen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003515_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, at the border of Ala Mhigo...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003515_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Währenddessen, an der Front<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003520_HIEN<tab>[GROAN]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003520_HIEN<tab>Grrr!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003530_YUGIRI<tab>Fall, fiend!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003530_YUGIRI<tab>Dein Kopf gehört mir!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003540_YUGIRI<tab>[PAINED SCREAM]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003540_YUGIRI<tab>Uuuh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003550_HIEN<tab>Yugiri!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003550_HIEN<tab>Yugiri!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003560_HIEN<tab>[PAINED SHOUT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003560_HIEN<tab>Uaaah!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003570_LYSE<tab>Damn you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003570_LYSE<tab>Stirb, Dämon!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003571_LYSE<tab>[PAINED SHOUT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003571_LYSE<tab>Uhhh!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003580_RESISTANCEFIGHTER<tab>[PAINED SHOUT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003580_RESISTANCEFIGHTER<tab>Urrrgh<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003590_HIEN<tab>Magic? With a Garlean body? That's hardly fair...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003590_HIEN<tab>Arrr<var 1D /var>... M-Magie? Mit dem Körper eines Garlears? Was denn noch<var 1D /var>...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003600_HIEN<tab>Still, he must be stopped...no matter the cost...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003600_HIEN<tab>Er muss vernichtet werden<var 1D /var>... Ahhh<var 1D /var>... Koste es, was es wolle!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003610_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Ah, Bringer of Light. It has been too long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003610_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Ah, <var 08 E905 ((die Dienerin)) ((der Diener)) /var> des Lichts<var 1D /var>... Ich hatte dich schon vermisst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003620_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)No words to mark our reunion? ...So be it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003620_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Hast du denn gar nichts zu sagen? ... Meinetwegen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003630_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Equilibrium must be restored... And only your death will redress the balance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003630_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Ich bin hier, um das Gleichgewicht herzustellen. Und das werde ich tun<var 1D /var>... indem ich dich auslösche!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003640_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Your Mother chose Her champion well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003640_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Hydaelyn hat eine gute Wahl mit dir getroffen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003650_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Yet for all your strength, you will still fail.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003650_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Aber um diesen Körper und meine Seele zu bezwingen, reicht auch deine Kraft nicht aus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003660_ROBEMAN<tab>[DERISIVE SNORT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003660_ROBEMAN<tab>Ha!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Please... I beseech you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Los<var 1D /var>... Geh schon auf!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003680_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Hm? Someone calls to you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003680_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Hm? Was ist das?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003690_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Too late, alas.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003690_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Nichts, was mich aufhalten wird<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(-???-)At last, I've found you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003700_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Endlich! Endlich hab ich dich!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Please! There is no cause for alarm!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Keine Angst. Ich meine es gut mit dir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Though, I confess, this is not where I had intended to meet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Zugegeben, eigentlich wollte ich dich ja woanders treffen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But the place of our meeting is of no consequence─like the war you wage. Win or lose, the path you walk leads only to oblivion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Aber der Ort spielt keine Rolle. Genauso wenig, wie der Krieg, den ihr führt. Hör mir jetzt gut zu. Du befindest dich auf dem falschen Weg.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The better path leads you here. To me. I have need of your strength.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003740_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Der richtige Weg führt dich hierher, zu mir. Ich brauche deine Kraft.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Who are you!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wer bist du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>You have to send me back, now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Lass mich sofort weiterkämpfen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003750_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am afraid such questions will have to wait. We have precious little time, and your work is not yet done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003750_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Für Fragen ist jetzt keine Zeit. Es gibt etwas sehr Wichtiges, das du zu tun hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003760_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The battle is over. The danger passed. But your work is not yet done.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003760_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Der Kampf ist nicht mehr wichtig. Die Gefahr ist vorbei. Aber es gibt etwas sehr Wichtiges, das du zu tun hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003770_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Go to the Crystal Tower. I have left something for you near its base.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003770_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Geh zu dem Kristallturm. Ich habe dort etwas für dich hinterlassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It will serve as a beacon of sorts. One which I pray will help you on your journey.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003780_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ich nenne es einen<var 1D /var>... Sender. Er wird dir auf deinem Weg helfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>All you need do is find it. I will take care of the rest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003790_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Du musst ihn nur finden. Für alles andere werde ich sorgen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Soon we will throw wide the gates...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003800_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bald. Bald werde ich den Weg gefunden haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And the path to the First will be yours to walk at last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003810_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Dann wirst du bei mir sein, im ersten der Splitter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003820_AYMERIC<tab>You're awake. Thank heavens!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003820_AYMERIC<tab>Bist du wach? Den Himmeln sei Dank!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was antwortest du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What happened?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was ist passiert?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Where is Zenos?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was ist aus Zenos geworden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003830_AYMERIC<tab>Do you recall the confrontation with Zenos? You were the first to come to the aid of Mistress Lyse and the others on the front line.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003830_AYMERIC<tab>Erinnerst du dich an deinen Kampf gegen Zenos? Du bist an die Front geeilt, um Lyse und den anderen zu helfen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003840_AYMERIC<tab>I see you recall that much, at least.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003840_AYMERIC<tab>Gut, an deinen Kampf gegen Zenos erinnerst du dich also noch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003850_AYMERIC<tab>In the midst of your duel, it is said you faltered, and that the crown prince seized the opportunity to deliver a mortal blow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003850_AYMERIC<tab>Es heißt, du wärst plötzlich zu Boden gegangen. Zenos war im Begriff, dir ein schnelles Ende zu bereiten und holte zum tödlichen Schlag aus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003860_AYMERIC<tab>Yet before his blade could find its mark, he was distracted by the arrival of a second adversary who bore you away from the battlefield and into the hands of our chirurgeons.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003860_AYMERIC<tab>Aber kurz bevor sein Schwert auf dich niedersauste, kam dir jemand zu Hilfe. Er versetzte Zenos einen empfindlichen Treffer, und schaffte dich außer Gefahr und in die Hände unserer Heiler.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003870_AYMERIC<tab>Lest you wonder, he left before you awoke. As is his wont.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003870_AYMERIC<tab>Ich hätte dir deinen Retter ja gerne vorgestellt, aber er zog es vor, sofort wieder zu verschwinden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003880_AYMERIC<tab>Estinien never was one for emotional farewells.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003880_AYMERIC<tab>Du weißt ja selbst, dass Estinien kein Mann der langen Abschiede ist.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003890_AYMERIC<tab>Though Zenos bested all before him, the battle clearly took its toll, for he retreated shortly after your rescue. Seeing this, the remaining imperial forces decided discretion was the better part of valor and pulled back, allowing us to reestablish our position.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003890_AYMERIC<tab>Zenos war nach eurer Begegnung so geschwächt, dass er sich von der Front zurückzog. Ohne ihn verließ die Garlear ihr Mut, und sie brachen ihren Vorstoß ab. Aber die Lage an der Grenze ist weiterhin angespannt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003900_AYMERIC<tab>We have since received word of renewed unrest in the provinces, doubtless inspired by the efforts of the Eorzean Alliance and our Far Eastern allies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003900_AYMERIC<tab>Es gibt auch gute Nachrichten. Unser Erfolg hat den Aufständischen in den garleischen Provinzen neuen Auftrieb gegeben. Von überall erreichen uns Berichte über neue Revolten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003910_AYMERIC<tab>Nor does the good news end there. We have also come into possession of intelligence suggesting unrest within the imperial court.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003910_AYMERIC<tab>Außerdem scheint Thancreds Plan aufzugehen. Es heißt, dass ein Teil der kaiserlichen Familie mit Anspruch auf den Thron gegen Varis intrigiert.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003920_AYMERIC<tab>This would certainly explain why both the Emperor and Lord Zenos appear to have abandoned the fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003920_AYMERIC<tab>Das Kaiserreich ist bis in seine Grundfesten erschüttert. Da ist es verständlich, dass sich Varis und Zenos zurückgezogen haben.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003930_AYMERIC<tab>A long-awaited ray of hope in these dark times.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003930_AYMERIC<tab>Es gibt also Licht am düsteren Horizont.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was sagst du?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Is Alisaie all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Wie geht es Alisaie?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What of the Scions?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was ist mit unseren bewusstlosen Freunden?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003940_AYMERIC<tab>Yet to awake, I'm afraid. But, please...concentrate on your own recovery for now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003940_AYMERIC<tab>Alisaie und die anderen sind immer noch bewusstlos. Aber bitte, du solltest dich erst einmal selbst erholen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003950_AYMERIC<tab>You have carried the hopes of some half-dozen nations─and we are all eternally grateful for your efforts─but no one is without their limits. Not even you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003950_AYMERIC<tab>Du hast die Hoffnung zweier Kontinente auf deinen Schultern getragen. Wir sind dir alle auf Ewigkeit dankbar. Aber jeder hat seine Grenzen. Auch du.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003960_AYMERIC<tab>Leave this fight to us, my friend. You have earned your rest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003960_AYMERIC<tab>Wir werden uns weiter um die Verteidigung kümmern. Ruhe du dich nur aus und komm wieder zu Kräften.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003970_AYMERIC<tab>Ah, but before I forget...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003970_AYMERIC<tab>Ach ja, bevor ich es vergesse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003980_AYMERIC<tab>I was asked to deliver a message as soon as you awoke.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003980_AYMERIC<tab>Eine gewisse Dame, von kleiner Statur aber mit großem Herzen, hat mir aufgetragen, dir etwas auszurichten, sobald du aufwachst.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003990_AYMERIC<tab>A reminder that you are not alone, though many of your allies have fallen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_003990_AYMERIC<tab>Sie möchte dich daran erinnern, dass du nicht alleine bist<var 1D /var>- auch wenn so viele eurer Freunde in Ohnmacht liegen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004000_AYMERIC<tab>When you are well and rested, you are to return home, where friends will be waiting for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004000_AYMERIC<tab>Sie erwartet deine Rückkehr im Sonnenstein.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004010_AYMERIC<tab>Now, if you will excuse me, I must return to the front. May we meet again soon. Under happier circumstances.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004010_AYMERIC<tab>Jetzt entschuldige mich. Ich kehre zurück an die Front. Auf dass wir uns bald wiedersehen<var 1D /var>- gestärkt, und unter einem besseren Stern.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004020_TATARU<tab>By the Twelve, I don't believe it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004020_TATARU<tab>Bei den Zwölf! Ich traue meinen Augen nicht! <schluchz>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004030_TATARU<tab>[SOFTLY SOBBING]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004030_TATARU<tab><schluchz>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004040_TATARU<tab>I rushed back as soon as I could.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004040_TATARU<tab>I-Ich bin sofort zurückgekehrt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004050_TATARU<tab>I swear, my heart nearly stopped when I heard you'd collapsed like the others. What in heavens' name is going on?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004050_TATARU<tab>Als ich hörte, dass du auch noch ohnmächtig geworden bist, da gab es für mich kein Halten mehr. Sag, was ist denn passiert?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004060_TATARU<tab>“Win or lose, the path you walk leads only to oblivion.” ...Well, that's helpful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004060_TATARU<tab>Du befindest dich auf dem falschen Weg? Ach, da hätte er ruhig etwas genauer sein können.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004070_TATARU<tab>And what else did he say? The better path leads to him? Hmm...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004070_TATARU<tab>Und der richtige Weg soll angeblich zu ihm führen, ja? Hm<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004080_TATARU<tab>If his is the voice you've all been hearing, perhaps the others are with him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004080_TATARU<tab>Weißt du was? Wenn die anderen die gleiche Stimme gehört haben<var 1D /var>... sind ihre Seelen vielleicht bei ihm!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004090_TATARU<tab>Ser Aymeric said the fighting had reached a stalemate, didn't he.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004090_TATARU<tab>Aymeric hat gesagt, dass die Garlear sich an der Grenze ruhig verhalten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004100_TATARU<tab>But if that monster masquerading as Zenos comes back...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004100_TATARU<tab>Aber der Ascian, der in Zenos' Haut steckt, kann jederzeit wieder auftauchen, und dann<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004110_TATARU<tab>Thancred, Y'shtola, Urianger, Alphinaud, Alisaie... You're going to need all of them on your side to defeat him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004110_TATARU<tab>... brauchst du jede Hilfe! Ohne Y'shtola und Urianger wissen wir nicht, was wir zu tun haben! Wir brauchen Thancreds Zuversicht! Wir brauchen Alphinauds Starrsinn und Alisaies Tatendrang! Ohne sie<var 1D /var>... <schluchz>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004120_TATARU<tab>And I forbid you from going to face him on your own. Do you hear me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004120_TATARU<tab>Ohne sie darfst du nicht wieder gegen Zenos kämpfen. Das lasse ich nicht zu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004130_TATARU<tab>So if you must leave... Go and find the others. Bring them home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004130_TATARU<tab>... Du-Du musst zuerst<var 1D /var>... <schluchz><var 1D /var>... unsere Freunde zurückholen! Wenn sie wieder da sind<var 1D /var>... <schnief><var 1D /var>... werden die Dinge schon werden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004140_TATARU<tab>As for where to start, you said the stranger had left a beacon for you at the Crystal Tower, right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004140_TATARU<tab>Was ist mit dem Sender, den der Fremde für dich hinterlassen hat?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004150_TATARU<tab>Well, it's not as if you haven't been there before...but I'm guessing “near its base” doesn't narrow things down very much.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004150_TATARU<tab>Du warst doch schon einmal beim Kristallturm. Aber einen Sender hast du dort nicht gefunden, oder?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004160_TATARU<tab>But how are you to find it now that the tower has been sealed shut?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004160_TATARU<tab>Du warst doch schon einmal beim Kristallturm. Aber einen Sender hast du dort nicht gefunden, oder? Und versiegelt ist der Turm jetzt auch noch.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004170_TATARU<tab>But I'm sure I remember hearing that the tower was blocked off?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004170_TATARU<tab>Von der Sankt Coinach-Stiftung weiß ich, dass der Zugang zum Kristallturm versiegelt ist. Wir müssen einen Weg hinein finden.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004180_TATARU<tab>There has to be a way... If anyone would know, it's Cid and the researchers of Saint Coinach's Find.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004180_TATARU<tab>Ich weiß! Ich werde Cid und die Sankt Coinach-Stiftung um Hilfe bitten.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004190_TATARU<tab>Don't you worry. We'll find that beacon for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004190_TATARU<tab>Zusammen mit unseren Freunden hier im Sonnenstein werden wir das Gerät schon finden. Verlass dich auf uns!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004200_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the imperial palace...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004200_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Währenddessen im Kaiserlichen Palast<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004210_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)...I pray you have good reason for abandoning the front.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004210_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Ich hoffe, du hast das Schlachtfeld aus guten Gründen verlassen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004220_VARIS<tab>How could I remain there while the rumor that my son is possessed by a demon spreads like a sickness here at home?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004220_VARIS<tab>Wie kann ich an der Front verweilen, wenn das Gerücht, dass mein Sohn von einem Dämonen besessen ist, sich wie eine Seuche verbreitet?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004230_VARIS<tab>I will not be made to fight for the throne a second time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004230_VARIS<tab>Ich habe keine Lust, ein weiteres Mal um den Thron kämpfen zu müssen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004240_VARIS<tab>But what of you? Did you not tell me you would destroy Eorzea's champion with the ease that one might swat a fly?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004240_VARIS<tab>Und du? Wolltest du <var 08 E905 ((die Kriegerin)) ((den Krieger)) /var> des Lichts nicht zerdrücken wie eine Fliege?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004250_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)A minor setback. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> will not escape me again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004250_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Es kam etwas dazwischen. Beim nächsten Mal entkommt <var 08 E905 ((sie)) ((er)) /var> mir nicht.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004260_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Where is your grandsire? I would have words with him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004260_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Wo steckt eigentlich dein Großvater? Ich habe mit ihm zu sprechen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004270_VARIS<tab>How should I know? Do you hide from each other's sight as well? I imagine he is doing what all Ascians do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004270_VARIS<tab>Woher soll ich das wissen? <var 1A 02 /var>Du<var 1A 01 /var> bist doch der Ascian.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004280_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)Hmmm... He must have found a way to take advantage of this turmoil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004280_ROBEMAN<tab>(-Zenos-)He. Ich kann es mir schon denken. Er hat bestimmt einen Weg gefunden, die Lage zu seinem Vorteil zu nutzen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004290_VARIS<tab>Men are not pawns to be played with, Ascian. You underestimate us at your peril.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004290_VARIS<tab>Ihr Ascians haltet uns für Spielfiguren, mit denen ihr machen könnt, was ihr wollt. Aber seid euch da mal nicht so sicher!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004300_VARIS<tab>This war will not be decided by you and yours. Man must choose his own fate, and I, for my part, will do all within my power to see Garlemald emerge victorious.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004300_VARIS<tab>Die Geschicke dieser Welt werden von ihren Völkern entschieden. Ich bin der Kaiser des Garleischen Reiches und werde alles dafür tun, dass wir die Schlacht als Sieger verlassen!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004310_IMPERIALENGINEER<tab>Pray forgive the intrusion, Your Radiance, but the requested preparations are now complete.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004310_IMPERIALENGINEER<tab>E-Entschuldigt die Störung, Majestät! Ich berichte gehorsamst, dass die Vor<var 16 /var>bereitungen abgeschlossen sind.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004320_IMPERIALENGINEER<tab>We stand ready to begin production of Black Rose, upon your order.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004320_IMPERIALENGINEER<tab>Auf Euren Befehl hin können wir jederzeit mit der Produktion der Schwarzen Rose beginnen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004330_KATANASOLDIER<tab>My enemy. My friend. Had I been but a step faster...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004330_KATANASOLDIER<tab>So knapp habe ich dich verpasst, <var 08 E905 ((Heldin)) ((Held)) /var> der Wilden<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004340_IMPERIALSOLDIER04505<tab>Bloody savages!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004340_IMPERIALSOLDIER04505<tab>Stirb, Wilder!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004350_IMPERIALSOLDIER04505<tab>[PAINED SHOUT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004350_IMPERIALSOLDIER04505<tab>Arrgh<var 1D /var>...!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004360_KATANASOLDIER<tab>A pity your hunt leads you elsewhere... Not that I am surprised.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004360_KATANASOLDIER<tab>Wie bedauerlich, dass du das Schlachtfeld so schnell verlassen hast.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004370_KATANASOLDIER<tab>May you find joy in it. Grow stronger, more savage, and savor every triumph...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004370_KATANASOLDIER<tab>Aber es sei dir vergönnt. Sammle deine Kräfte. Das wird die Hetzjagd nur umso unterhaltsamer machen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004380_KATANASOLDIER<tab>In the meantime...I will reclaim that which is rightfully mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04505_004380_KATANASOLDIER<tab>In der Zwischenzeit werde ich mir zurückholen, was mein ist.
